name: Sequor
description:
"Who knows... maybe, just maybe, ...today's gonna be different?"

For Ridel, a "Dreamstrider", this is just another day in the job:  find the client, protect the client, earn cash. But something about his current client seems a bit different..

Guide the "Blind Client" throughout a dungeon filled with puzzles, traps, and monsters in this epic platformer!

Created for the IGMC 2018

Credits:

Concept, Graphics, Animation, Particle Effects, Level Design, Programming , Additional Voices - JC Malapit (Caotic Pixel)

Sound Effects - freesound.org, bfxr
